description: Lists the top 10 currently running applications or processes.
Creates a new folder on the desktop. Requires a 'folder_name'.
Opens a given URL in the default web browser. Requires a 'url'.
Launches a desktop application. Requires an 'app_name'.
Performs a Google search for a given query. Requires a 'query'.
Creates a new empty file on the desktop. Requires a 'file_name'.
Changes the desktop wallpaper. Requires the full 'file_path' to an image.
